item.title: Grant McLennan R.I.P.
item.dc:creator: kim
item.description: So shocked to hear that songwriter Grant McLennan died in his sleep yesterday. The loss of a great artist and gentleman is always sad, but when it’s an artist whose creative life was so thoroughly meshed with another’s, it’s doubly tragic. In memory of Grant, I’ve posted the Go-Betweens interview from Scram #14 (2000) on … Continue reading "Grant McLennan R.I.P."
item.content:encoded:
So shocked to hear that songwriter Grant McLennan died in his sleep yesterday. The loss of a great artist and gentleman is always sad, but when it’s an artist whose creative life was so thoroughly meshed with another’s, it’s doubly tragic.

In memory of Grant, I’ve posted the Go-Betweens interview from Scram #14 (2000) on the Scram website.

Our thoughts are with Robert, Adele, Glenn and Grant’s family.
